pkgmetadata.longdescription: Toyplot is the kid-sized plotting toolkit for Python with grownup-sized goals: * Develop beautiful plots that embrace the unique capabilities of electronic publishing and support repoducibility. * Create the best possible data graphics "out-of-the-box", maximizing data ink and minimizing chartjunk. * Provide a clean, minimalist interface that scientists and engineers will love. See the Toyplot documentation at http://toyplot.readthedocs.io, and the Toyplot sources at http://github.com/sandialabs/toyplot
